payment: PAYMENT DETAILS - We only accept Instant Paypal Payments. - The customer has a responsibility to provide paypal with a confirmed address. - Paying by Paypal allows us to provide you with a fast and efficient service.postagePOSTAGE DETAILS - All items are sent first class. - All orders are dispatched within 24 hours. (Monday-Friday) - All items are sent in a Jiffy Bag. - Please note, packaging may vary for some items.
